blocks.name: rngurd
blocks.content: Deduce the unit of a ring from its properties. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rngurd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wceq(c0, cfv(cur, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c3, cfv(cmulr, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c2))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c0), cv(s0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  syl5req(c0, cfv(cur, c1), cio(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), w0)
  dfur2(hs0, s0, cfv(cur, c1), cfv(cbs, c1), cfv(cmulr, c1), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cbs, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c1))
  eqid(cfv(cur, c1))
  mpbi2and(w0, wceq(cio(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), c0), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), c0), cv(s0)))))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), c0), cv(s0))))), wceq(cio(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), c0)), wcel(c0, c2), weu(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))))
  syl121anc(w0, weu(hs0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wcel(c0, cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), c0), cv(s0)))), wal(hs0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))))
  eleqtrd(c0, cfv(cbs, c1), c2, w0)
  mpbid(w0, wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), c0), cv(s0)))), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c0), cv(s0)))))

  anbi12d(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c2)), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, c0), cv(s0)), wceq(co(c0, cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), c0), cv(s0)))

  alrimiv(hs0, w0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cfv(cbs, c1)), wral(s0, cfv(cbs, c1), wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), cfv(cmulr, c1), cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))

  simpr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  eqeq12d(co(c0, c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0), co(c0, c3, cv(hs0)), cv(hs0), wa(wa(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))

  adantr(w0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wcel(c0, c2))
  simprr(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(s0)))))
  simprd(wa(wcel(c0, c2), wral(s0, c2, wa(wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, cv(s0)), cv(s0)), wceq(co(cv(s0), c3, cv(hs0)), cv(s0))))), wceq(co(c0, c3, cv(hs0)), c0), wceq(co(cv(hs0), c3, c0), c0))

blocks.name: ress1r
blocks.content: ` 1r ` is unaffected by restriction. This is a bit more generic than ~ subrg1 . (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 6-Sep-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm ress1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c4)))
  -| wceq(c4, co(c0, cress, c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cbs, c0))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cur, c0))
} = {
  rngurd(hs0, c1, c4, c2, cfv(cmulr, c0), w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c4)))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c4, c0)
  syl(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wceq(cfv(cmulr, c0), cfv(cmulr, c4)), wcel(c2, universe))
  sylancl(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, universe), wss(c2, c3), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ssexg(c2, c3, universe)
  ressmulr(c2, universe, cfv(cmulr, c0), c4, c0)
  simp2(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(c1, cfv(cmulr, c0), cv(hs0)), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  ringlidm(c0, cv(hs0), c3, c1, cfv(cmulr, c0))
  syl2anc(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(co(cv(hs0), cfv(cmulr, c0), c1), cv(hs0)), wcel(c0, crg), wcel(cv(hs0), c3))
  simpl1(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))
  sselda(cv(hs0), c2, c3, w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
  simp3(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3))
  ringridm(c0, cv(hs0), c3, cfv(cmulr, c0), c1)
  eqid(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cfv(cmulr, c0))
  diff.hs0.w(w3a(wcel(c0, crg), wcel(c1, c2), wss(c2, c3)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ress1r(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)→ c1 =(1r ` c4))
  ⊣ c4 =(c0[|`s]c2)
  ⊣ c3 =(Base ` c0)
  ⊣ c1 =(1r ` c0)
} = {
  rngurd(hs0, c1, c4, c2, (× ` c0), (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3, c2 =(Base ` c4))
  ressbas2(c2, c3, c4, c0)
  syl((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), (× ` c0)=(× ` c4), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3), c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ⊆ c3, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c3, cbs, c0)
  ssexg(c2, c3, universe)
  ressmulr(c2, universe, (× ` c0), c4, c0)
  simp2(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3)
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (c1[(× ` c0)]hs0)= hs0, c0 ∈ Ring, hs0 ∈ c3)
  ringlidm(c0, hs0, c3, c1, (× ` c0))
  syl2anc(((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3)∧ hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0[(× ` c0)]c1)= hs0, c0 ∈ Ring, hs0 ∈ c3)
  simpl1(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3, hs0 ∈ c2)
  sselda(hs0, c2, c3, (c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
  simp3(c0 ∈ Ring, c1 ∈ c2, c2 ⊆ c3)
  ringridm(c0, hs0, c3, (× ` c0), c1)
  eqid((× ` c0))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c4)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c((× ` c0))
  diff.hs0.w((c0 ∈ Ring ∧ c1 ∈ c2 ∧ c2 ⊆ c3))
}

blocks.name: dvrdir
blocks.content: Distributive law for the division operation of a ring. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 30-Oct-2017.)
blocks.origin:
thm dvrdir(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, crg), w3a(wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c3, c2), wcel(c4, c5))), wceq(co(co(c1, c6, c3), c7, c4), co(co(c1, c7, c4), c6, co(c3, c7, c4))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(cbs, c0))
